drink.rule: Clint is squinting (extra drink if it's into the sunset).
For each scene of a vast desert or mountain range.
There's a horribly out of place ricochet sound.

twodrinks.rule: Clint speaks with a cigar in his mouth (once per scene).
Clint fires a revolver by using the hammer instead of the trigger.
Someone falls through or smashes through something.

gulp.rule: Clint is drinking liquor straight from the bottle.
Clint says a famous line (Ex. "Do you feel lucky?").
